This due minimal efficacy PO treatment migraine severe , therefore need parenteral treatment . IM Ketorolac one mainstay parenteral treatment . Despite FDA approval Cambia acute migraine treatment , insurance reticent cover treatment due high cost comparison generic diclofenac tablet , despite superior efficacy Cambia comparison generic diclofenac tablet ( Diener , Cephalalgia 2006 ) . One objective study would provide rationale justify insurance coverage treatment comparison generic tablet , home treatment less costly office visit emergency department visit receive IM ketorolac . A previous study Cambia demonstrate formulation diclofenac potassium oral solution effective reduce pain intensity within 30 minute , may relate 15-minute Tmax associate formulation . The rapid-onset benefit sustain 24 hour post-treatment ( Lipton , Cephalalgia 2010 )
